A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney took the reigns here and it paid of spectacularly. From start to finish I couldn't wipe the smile off my face. It was really great seeing the characters grown into their own\, and the expansion of what the force could do. The direction\, cinematography\, effects and acting were all top notch and what someone should expect from a star wars film\, especially one done by disney.
